data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Manabi to agree with you and with one another.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manabi, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Manabi, Ecuador, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary: On average, 184 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Manabi, Ecuador.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, make bold the prophets in Manabi, Ecuador so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Manabi.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Manabi, Ecuador to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 986,841 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Manabi a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Manabi.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Manabi
location.cities_list: Manta, Portoviejo, Chone, Bahía de Caráquez, Jipijapa
location.cities_list_w_pop: Manta (183,166), Portoviejo (170,326), Chone (44,751), Bahía de Caráquez (37,056), Jipijapa (35,901)
